Key Features.Visual Creation Studio: Generate and edit images through Stability AI with intelligent LLM assistance (tool use)
Key Features.Semantic Search: Find what you need with vector-based search that understands context, not just keywords
Key Features.Real-time Processing: Asynchronous processing with backgound workers and WebSockets that deliver generated content

Interface.Central Chat Area: Your AI interactions with tool use
Interface.Context Panel: Featuring a scrollspy for easy navigation and related chats powered by nearest neighbor matching

screenshots.caption: Offload image prompting and options to AI
Use presets to prime the LLM for specific tasks
Link ideas by quickly referencing previous chats related to the current one

Key Features.Tempo Synchronization: Syncs external hardware to Mixxx's Sync Leader deck, following tempo changes in real-time
Key Features.Beat Adjustment: Fine-tune beat alignment with an encoder that temporarily adjusts clock speed to match phases
Key Features.MIDI Transport Controls: Dedicated buttons for MIDI Start, Stop, and Continue messages with intelligent beat-aware behavior
Key Features.Visual Feedback: OLED display shows clock status, sequencer state, and BPM with beat indicator LEDs
Key Features.Dual-Mode Operation: Functions with Mixxx or as a standalone master MIDI clock generator

Technical Details.Microcontroller: Build for boards based on the ATmega32u4
Technical Details.Multiple Outputs: Sends MIDI clock over both USB and 5-pin DIN connections simultaneously

screenshots.caption: Mixxx MIDI Clock Arduino prototype controls

Key Features.Emacs/Org-mode: Static website published using Emacs's Org-mode
Key Features.Automation: Automatic publishing using GitHub actions on each commit
Key Features.Search: Client side search powered by Lunrjs
Key Features.Comments: Comments powered by Utterances via GitHub issues
